name: DOORS - Escape to Scary Doors
description:
Escape to Scary Doors

Escape to Scary Doors. If you are a fan of scary horror games then these scary hotel doors are the best game you should play.
lets run and hide to save your life from enemy monsters. There are several door monsters, known as entities, that roam the hotel.

Each entity has its own jumpscare that will play when it kills the player, and each entity has a different effect. Some may just scare the player while others will kill them instantly.
The story is that you are locked in an abandoned hotel, you have to hide and search for hidden objects, solve puzzles and puzzles, unlock doors and complete many challenges.

Game Feature:
Epilepsy and Audible Warning
Helmet recommended
Max or 60% graphics recommended
